short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select some text -> Right click -> Click estimate read time -> Enter you WPM -> Get estimated read time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple chrome extension which allows you to estimate the amount of time it will take you to read a particular text. Select Select some text -> Right click -> Click estimate read time -> Enter you WPM -> Get estimated read time.
